issue.title: Python: Add benchmarks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-79](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-79). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add benchmarks to test the PyArrow performance. Will do this with https://asv.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
